title: Colts-Saints MNF Preview, Predicting the Patriots punishment, Concerns with Baker Mayfield (Football 12/16)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jared Dubin to preview Colts vs Saints on Monday Night Football (3:00). The guys discuss Drew Brees' chances to break the all-time record for passing TDs, Alvin Kamara's slight regression and Jacoby Brissett's recent struggles before talking player props and their picks for the game. Then, Jason La Canfora joins the podcast to discuss Joe Burrow's likelihood of ending up with the Bengals (26:00), why the Bucs should bring back Jameis Winston (31:45), what the Patriots punishment will be for filming the Bengals sideline (40:30) and why there's cause for concern about Baker Mayfield in Cleveland (55:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: Will Brinson is joined by Jared Dubin to preview Monday Night Football's matchup between the Colts and Saints.
